org.terrier.structures

Class LexiconEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.LexiconEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, EntryStatistics, Pointer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicLexiconEntry, BasicTermStatsLexiconEntry, MemoryLexiconEntry, MultiLexiconEntry

    public abstract class LexiconEntry
extends Object
implements EntryStatistics, Pointer, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Represents the statistics of a term in the Lexicon, and a pointer to the term's location in a PostingIndex. For these reasons, this class implements Pointer and EntryStatistics.
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald
    See Also:
    Lexicon, Pointer, EntryStatistics, Serialized Form
